# Ventricular Tachyarrhythmias {#sec-vtach}

:::{.callout-note}
**Sustained VTach** lasts ≥ 30 seconds, whereas **non-sustained VTach** lasts \< 30 seconds.
:::

## Stable VT/VF

-   Drug of choice: Amiodarone 150 mg over 10 minutes
    -   repeat PRN if VT recurs
    -   Maintenance infusion: Amio 1 mg/min for 6 hrs

## Unstable VT/VF

-   Shock
-   Drug of choice: Amiodarone 300mg IV/IO push
    -   If no cardioversion → Amio 150 mg IV/IO push
    -   After conversion: Amiodarone 1 mg/min x 6 hrs, then 0.5 mg/min x 18 hrs
